hint.text:
Move your cursor with the arrow keys. Select with SPACE. Cancel out of an action or menu with 'F'.
Select your character to open the action menu, then select move to choose a tile to move to. Any tile that lights up is within your move range.

You can only move once per turn. To move again, you need to end your current turn and wait for your next turn.
Notice that you cannot move to a tile that has an obstacle like a wall or tree.
Make your way towards the sleeping villager.

Move to a tile adjacent to the sleeping villager.
Once you are adjacent to a villager you can feed on it to gain blood.

You are now able to feed on the villager.
Select 'Abilities' in the action menu and then choose 'Feed'. Tiles in range of the ability will light up. Select the villager to feed on it. The villager will be drained, and you will glow red to indicate you have gained blood.

Now that you have gained blood, make your way back to your lair to complete the level.
You need to make it back to your lair before sunrise to complete the level, so always keep an eye on the countdown at the top left of the screen.
